00026 
00027 void sub_add(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const base_integer&
00028     n2)
00029 {
00030     bool swap(n1._get_length() < n2._get_length());
00031     const base_integer &larger(swap ? n2 : n1), &smaller(swap ? n1 : n2);
00032 
00033     // The answer to any addition problem contains, at most, one digit more
00034     // than the largest addend.
00035     integer a;
00036     a._realloc(larger._get_length() + 1);
00037 
00038     // Add the digits, starting at the least-significant digit.
00039     const digit_t *lp = larger._get_digits(), *l_end = lp + larger._get_length(),
00040         *sp = smaller._get_digits(), *s_end = sp + smaller._get_length();
00041     digit_t *ap = a._get_writable_digits(), *a_end = ap + a._get_length();
00042 
00043     digit_t carry = 0;
00044     while (sp != s_end) {
00045         doubledigit_t t = doubledigit_t(*lp++) + *sp++ + carry;
00046         if (t >= digit_overflowbit) {
00047             carry = 1;
00048             *ap++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t - digit_overflowbit);
00049         } else {
00050             carry = 0;
00051             *ap++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00052         }
00053     }
00054 
00055     if (carry) {
00056         while (lp != l_end) {
00057             if (*lp == digit_mask) { *ap++ = 0; ++lp; }
00058             else { *ap++ = *lp++ + 1; carry = 0; break; }
00059         }
00060     }
00061     if (carry && ap != a_end) *ap++ = 1;
00062 
00063     while (lp != l_end) *ap++ = *lp++;
00064     while (ap != a_end) *ap++ = 0;
00065 
00066     if (n1._get_negative()) a._set_negative(true);
00067     a._cleanup();
00068     target._attach(a);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void sub_subtract(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const
00072     base_integer& n2)
00073 {
00074     bool neg1=n1._get_negative();
00075     bool swap=((neg1 ? 1 : -1) == compare(n1, n2));
00076     const base_integer &larger(swap ? n2 : n1), &smaller(swap ? n1 : n2);
00077 
00078     // For subtraction, the answer will always be less than or equal to the
00079     // size of the longest operand.
00080     integer a;
00081     a._realloc(larger._get_length());
00082 
00083     // Now subtract the digits, starting at the least-significant one.
00084     const digit_t *lp = larger._get_digits(), *l_end = lp + larger._get_length(),
00085         *sp = smaller._get_digits(), *s_end = sp + smaller._get_length();
00086     digit_t *ap = a._get_writable_digits();
00087 
00088     digit_t borrow = 0;
00089     while (sp != s_end) {
00090         doubledigit_t t = digit_overflowbit + *lp++ - *sp++ - borrow;
00091         if (t < digit_overflowbit) {
00092             borrow = 1;
00093             *ap++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00094         } else {
00095             borrow = 0;
00096             *ap++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t - digit_overflowbit);
00097         }
00098     }
00099 
00100     if (borrow) {
00101         while (lp != l_end) {
00102             if (*lp == 0) { *ap++ = digit_mask; ++lp; }
00103             else { *ap++ = *lp++ - 1; borrow = 0; break; }
00104         }
00105     }
00106     while (lp != l_end) *ap++ = *lp++;
00107     if (borrow != 0) swap = !swap;
00108 
00109     if (neg1) a._set_negative(true);
00110     a._cleanup();
00111 
00112     if (swap) {
00113         target._attach(neg_t(a));
00114     } else {
00115         target._attach(a);
00116     }
00117 }
00118 
00119 void divide_by_single_digit(base_integer& qtarget, base_integer& rtarget, const
00120     base_integer& d1, digit_t d2)
00121 {
00122     size_t d1len=d1._get_length();
00123     const digit_t *d1digits=d1._get_digits();
00124 
00125     integer quotient, remainder;
00126     quotient._realloc(d1len);
00127     remainder._realloc(1);
00128 
00129     doubledigit_t a=0;
00130     const doubledigit_t lomask(digit_mask);
00131     const doubledigit_t himask(doubledigit_t(digit_mask) << bits_per_digit);
00132 
00133     int m = int(d1len) - 1;
00134     const digit_t *d1p=d1digits+m;
00135     digit_t *qp=quotient._get_writable_digits()+m;
00136     for (int i = m; i >= 0; --i, --d1p, --qp) {
00137         a = (a & ~lomask) | *d1p;
00138         *qp = static_cast<digit_t>(a / d2);
00139         a = (a & ~himask) | ((a % d2) << bits_per_digit);
00140     }
00141     remainder._get_writable_digits()[0] = static_cast<digit_t>((a & himask) >>
00142         bits_per_digit);
00143 
00144     quotient._cleanup();
00145     remainder._cleanup();
00146     qtarget._attach(quotient);
00147     rtarget._attach(remainder);
00148 }
00149 
00150 void sub_divide2(base_integer& qtarget, base_integer& rtarget, const
00151     base_integer& d1, const base_integer& d2)
00152 {
00153     assert(d2._get_digit(d2._get_length()-1) >= digit_overflowbit / 2);
00154 
00155     const digit_t *byDigits = d2._get_digits();
00156 
00157     integer quotient, r(d1._to_integer());
00158 
00159     size_t n=d2._get_length(), m=d1._get_length() - n;
00160     size_t i=m+n, j=m;
00161     quotient._realloc(j+1);
00162     digit_t *qdigits=quotient._get_writable_digits();
00163 
00164     r._make_unique();
00165     do {
00166         doubledigit_t ri=(doubledigit_t(r._get_digit(i, true))
00167             << bits_per_digit) + r._get_digit(i-1, true);
00168         doubledigit_t q=(std::min<doubledigit_t>)(ri / byDigits[n-1],
00169             digit_mask);
00170 
00171         while (1) {
00172             // We need three digits here, a doubledigit_t won't suffice.
00173             doubledigit_t r2a=ri - (q * byDigits[n-1]);
00174             integer r2=(integer(r2a) << bits_per_digit) + r._get_digit(i-2);
00175             if (byDigits[n-2] * q <= r2) break;
00176             --q;
00177         }
00178 
00179         integer bq;
00180         multiply(bq, d2, fixed_integer_any(q));
00181         if (r < bq) {
00182             --q;
00183             subtract(bq, temp_t(bq), d2);
00184         }
00185 
00186         integer rtemp((r >> (bits_per_digit * (i-n))) - bq);
00187 
00188         digit_t *rdigits=r._get_writable_digits();
00189 
00190         size_t rlen=r._get_length();
00191         for (size_t x=0; x<=n && i-n+x < rlen; ++x)
00192             rdigits[i-n+x]=rtemp._get_digit(x, true);
00193         r._cleanup();
00194 
00195         qdigits[j--]=digit_t(q);
00196     } while (--i >= n);
00197 
00198     quotient._cleanup();
00199 
00200     qtarget._attach(quotient);
00201     rtarget._attach(r);
00202 }
00203 
00204 void sub_divide(base_integer& qtarget, base_integer& rtarget, const
00205     base_integer& d1, const base_integer& d2)
00206 {
00207     if (d2._get_length()==1) {
00208         divide_by_single_digit(qtarget, rtarget, d1, d2._get_digit(0));
00209         return;
00210     }
00211 
00212     // The normalization step
00213     digit_t _d = static_cast<digit_t>(digit_overflowbit /
00214         (doubledigit_t(d2._get_digit(d2._get_length()-1))+1));
00215     if (_d > 1) {
00216         fixed_integer_any d(_d);
00217 
00218         integer dd1, dd2;
00219         multiply(dd1, d1, d);
00220         multiply(dd2, d2, d);
00221 
00222         integer q, r;
00223         sub_divide2(q, r, dd1, dd2);
00224 
00225         // Denormalization step. This requires a division by a single digit_t.
00226         integer qq, rr;
00227         divide_by_single_digit(qq, rr, r, _d);
00228         qtarget._attach(q);
00229         rtarget._attach(qq);
00230     } else {
00231         sub_divide2(qtarget, rtarget, d1, d2);
00232     }
00233 }
00234 
00235 void add(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const base_integer& n2) {
00236     if (n1._is_zero()) {
00237         target._attach(n2);
00238         return;
00239     } else if (n2._is_zero()) {
00240         target._attach(n1);
00241         return;
00242     } else if (n1._get_negative() != n2._get_negative()) {
00243         sub_subtract(target, n1, neg_t(n2));
00244     } else {
00245         sub_add(target, n1, n2);
00246     }
00247 }
00248 
00249 void subtract(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const base_integer&
00250     n2)
00251 {
00252     if (n1._is_zero()) {
00253         target._attach(neg_t(n2));
00254     } else if (n2._is_zero()) {
00255         target._attach(n1);
00256     } else if (n1._get_negative() != n2._get_negative()) {
00257         sub_add(target, n1, neg_t(n2));
00258     } else {
00259         sub_subtract(target, n1, n2);
00260     }
00261 }
00262 
00263 void multiply(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n, const base_integer&
00264     by)
00265 {
00266     if (n._is_zero() || by._is_zero()) {
00267         target._set_unsigned(0);
00268         return;
00269     }
00270 
00271     const digit_t *ndigits=n._get_digits(), *bydigits=by._get_digits();
00272     if (ndigits==bydigits) {
00273         sqr(target, n);
00274         if (n._get_negative() != by._get_negative()) target._set_negative(true);
00275         return;
00276     }
00277 
00278     size_t maxdigit = target._is_fixed()
00279         ? target._fixed_digits()
00280         : (std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max)();
00281     size_t nlen=n._get_length(), bylen=by._get_length();
00282 
00283     // In multiplication, we know that the answer will be less than or equal to
00284     // the sum of the lengths of the operands.
00285     integer answer;
00286     answer._realloc(nlen + bylen);
00287     digit_t *adigits=answer._get_writable_digits(), *ae = adigits +
00288         (std::min)(nlen + bylen, maxdigit);
00289 
00290     // Now multiply the digits, starting at the least-significant digit.
00291     const digit_t *d1 = ndigits, *d1e = d1 + (std::min)(nlen, maxdigit);
00292     for (int digit1 = 0; d1 < d1e; ++digit1, ++d1) {
00293         const digit_t *d2 = bydigits;
00294         const digit_t *d2e = d2 + (std::min)(bylen, maxdigit - digit1);
00295         for (int digit2 = 0; d2 < d2e; ++digit2, ++d2) {
00296             // First multiply the two digits
00297             doubledigit_t t=doubledigit_t(*d1) * *d2;
00298 
00299             // Now add the result to the answer.
00300             int carry=0;
00301             digit_t *a = adigits + digit1 + digit2;
00302             doubledigit_t addt=doubledigit_t(*a) + (t & digit_mask);
00303             if (addt >= digit_overflowbit) carry=1;
00304             *a++=static_cast<digit_t>(addt);
00305 
00306             addt=*a + ((t >> bits_per_digit) & digit_mask) + carry;
00307             if (addt >= digit_overflowbit) carry=1; else carry=0;
00308             *a++=static_cast<digit_t>(addt);
00309 
00310             while (carry && a < ae) {
00311                 addt=*a+1;
00312                 *a++ = static_cast<digit_t>(addt);
00313                 if (addt < digit_overflowbit) break;
00314             }
00315         }
00316     }
00317 
00318     answer._set_negative(n._get_negative() != by._get_negative());
00319     answer._cleanup();
00320     target._attach(answer);
00321 }
00322 
00323 void divide(base_integer& qtarget, base_integer& rtarget, const base_integer&
00324     d1, const base_integer& d2)
00325 {
00326     int sign1 = (d1._is_zero() ? 0 : d1._get_negative() ? -1 : 1);
00327     int sign2 = (d2._is_zero() ? 0 : d2._get_negative() ? -1 : 1);
00328     if (sign2 == 0) throw exceptions::divide_by_zero();
00329 
00330     int comp=compare(d1, d2, true);
00331     if (comp < 0) {
00332         qtarget._attach(integer::zero());
00333         rtarget._attach(d1);
00334     } else if (comp == 0) {
00335         qtarget._attach(fixed_integer_any(sign1 != sign2 ? 1 : -1));
00336         rtarget._attach(integer::zero());
00337     } else if (sign1 < 0 && sign2 < 0) {
00338         sub_divide(qtarget, rtarget, neg_t(d1), neg_t(d2));
00339         rtarget._set_negative(true);
00340     } else if (sign1 < 0) {
00341         sub_divide(qtarget, rtarget, neg_t(d1), d2);
00342         qtarget._set_negative(true);
00343         rtarget._set_negative(true);
00344     } else if (sign2 < 0) {
00345         sub_divide(qtarget, rtarget, d1, neg_t(d2));
00346         qtarget._set_negative(true);
00347     } else if (d2._get_length() == 1) {
00348         divide_by_single_digit(qtarget, rtarget, d1, d2._get_digit(0));
00349     } else {
00350         sub_divide(qtarget, rtarget, d1, d2);
00351     }
00352 }
00353 
00354 void divide(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const base_integer&
00355     n2)
00356 {
00357     integer remainder;
00358     divide(target, remainder, n1, n2);
00359 }

00372 integer abs(const integer& n) {
00373     if (n._get_negative()) {
00374         return -n;
00375     } else {
00376         return n;
00377     }
00378 }

00388 integer negate(const integer& n) {
00389     integer nn(n);
00390     nn._toggle_negative();
00391     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(nn);
00392 }

00402 integer add(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00403     integer r;
00404     detail::add(r, n1, n2);
00405     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

00434 integer multiply(const integer& n, const integer& by) {
00435     integer r;

00450 integer divide(const integer& dividend, const integer& divisor) {
00451     integer q, r;
00452     detail::divide(q, r, dividend, divisor);
00453     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(q);

00469 integer::divide_t divide_r(const integer& d1, const integer& d2) {
00470     integer q, r;
00471     detail::divide(q, r, d1, d2);
00472     return BOOST_XINT_FORWARD(integer::divide_t, integer::divide_t(
00473         BOOST_XINT_MOVE(q), BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r)));
00474 }
